name: West of Sunfall 7
flavor_text:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: Recoil pattern on this weapon is more predictably vertical. Fires quickly with high accuracy.

perks.description:
Sharp Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Crossfire HCS

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster
